jp_text: この泥クジラは何十年も前から
google_translated: This mud teira is from decades for decades

en_text:
And you want to move it?
Make it go somewhere?
jp_text: それを動かす？ 向かわせる？
google_translated: Move it?Do you want to face?

en_text:
Our lives would've been a lot easier
if we could!
jp_text: そんな事できれば苦労はないんだ！
google_translated: There is no hardship if you can do that!

en_text: I would like to be alone for a bit.
jp_text:
（リコス）
少し 一人になりたいの…
google_translated: I want to be a little one ...

en_text:
Aíma. Thank goodness.
I've been looking for you.
jp_text: よかった！ ずっと探していたんだ
google_translated: Was good!I was looking for a long time

en_text:
I got her from someone named Olivínis
I met on Skyros.
jp_text:
スキロスで会ったオリヴィニス
って子から もらったんだ
google_translated:
Olivinis who met in Skiros
She got her from the child

en_text: I won't give her to you.
jp_text: …君にあげるんじゃない

en_text: I just want you to tell me what she is.
jp_text:
その子がなんなのか
教えてほしいんだ
google_translated:
What is the child?
I want you to tell me

en_text:
Fálaina will set out on a new journey
after gaining Kokalo.
jp_text:
骨(コカロ)を得て
ファレナは新しい旅に出るわ
google_translated:
Get bone 
Falena goes to a new journey

en_text:
I will show you the story of Fálaina
and her criminals,
jp_text:
ファレナの秘密を教えてくれるって
言ってたよね？
google_translated:
I will teach you the secret of Ferena
Did you say?

en_text: and what this little one is.
jp_text:
この子が何なのかも
ファレナと罪人(つみびと)の物語も
google_translated:
What is this child
The story of Falena and sinno

en_text: Kokalo?
jp_text: （ロハリト）ん？

en_text: What... is going on?
jp_text:
（チャクロ）
エマ… どうなってるの… これ？

en_text: The Mud Whale is changing directions.
jp_text: コカロは ヌースの船の“舵”なの…
google_translated: Kokaro is the "rudder" of the nuh ship ...

en_text: Didn't you think it was strange
jp_text: おかしいと思わなかった？

en_text:
that Lykos' ship
and the battleship Skyros,
jp_text: リコスの船も 戦艦スキロスも

en_text:
both ships with a Nous,
could control their destination?
jp_text:
ヌースを乗せた船は
行き先を決めて動いていたわ…
google_translated:
A ship with a nuh
I decided to decide her destination ...

en_text: But not Fálaina.
jp_text: でも ファレナは そうじゃない

en_text: Life is a battle.
jp_text: 命は戦いなの

en_text:
<i>That night,
<i>the people of the Mud Whale had a dream.
jp_text:
（チャクロＮ）
その夜
泥クジラの民たちは夢を見た
google_translated:
That night
The people of the mud-teira dreamed

en_text:
<i>The girl sang a mysterious song
<i>inside their heads,
jp_text: 少女は頭の中で不思議な歌を歌い
google_translated: Girl sings a strange song in my head

en_text: <i>and prayed.
jp_text: 生きて 奪って 自分を燃やすのよ
google_translated: I will live and burn myself

en_text: <i>but the girl comes out as a teardrop,
jp_text:
少女は
涙の粒になって出てきて
google_translated:
Girl
She comes out of tears

en_text: <i>out the window.
jp_text: 窓の外に消えていった…
google_translated: It disappeared out of the window ...
